jest:afterAll.description: afterAll function is called once after all specs

jest:afterEach.description: afterEach function is called once after each spec

jest:beforeAll.description: beforeAll function is called once before all specs

jest:beforeEach.description: beforeEach function is called once before each spec

jest:describe.each.description: creates a describe block with different test data sets

jest:describe.only.description: creates a describe block that runs only

jest:describe.skip.description: creates a describe block that will be skipped

jest:it.each.description: creates an it block with different test data sets

jest:it.only.description: creates an it block that runs only

jest:it.skip.description: creates an it block that will be skipped

jest:it:async.description: creates an it block with async callback function

jest:template:cut.description: creates a template to test a class under test

jest:toBe.description: expects the first argument to be equal with the second one

jest:toEqual.description: expects the first argument to be equal with the second one

jest:toHaveBeenCalled.description: returns true if the spy was called

js:anonymousFunction.description: Creates an anonymous function in ES6 syntax

js:consoleAssert.description: If the specified expression is false, the message is written to the console along with a stack trace

js:consoleCount.description: Writes the the number of times that count() has been invoked at the same line and with the same label

js:consoleDebug.description: Displays a message in the console. Also display a blue right arrow icon along with the logged message in Safari

js:consoleDir.description: Prints a JavaScript representation of the specified object

js:consoleError.description: Displays a message in the console and also includes a stack trace from where the method was called

js:consoleGroup.description: Groups and indents all following output by an additional level, until console.groupEnd() is called.

js:consoleInfo.description: Displays a message in the console but also displays a blue information icon along with the logged message

js:consoleLog.description: Displays a message in the console

js:consoleLogObject.description: Displays an object in the console with its name

js:consoleTable.description: Displays tabular data as a table.

js:consoleTime.description: Sets starting point for execution time measurement

js:consoleTimeEnd.description: Sets end point for execution time measurement

js:consoleTrace.description: Prints a stack trace from the point where the method was called

js:consoleWarn.description: Displays a message in the console but also displays a yellow warning icon along with the logged message

js:constructor.description: Add default constructor in a class in ES6 syntax

js:destructingArray.description: Creates and assigns a local variable using array destructing

js:destructingObject.description: Creates and assigns a local variable using object destructing

js:exportClass.description: Export default class in ES6 syntax

js:exportClassExtends.description: Export default class which extends a base one in ES6 syntax

js:exportDefaultFunction.description: Export default function in ES6 syntax

js:exportNamedFunction.description: Export named function in ES6 syntax

js:exportNamedVariable.description: Export named variable in ES6 syntax

js:forEach.description: Creates a forEach statement in ES6 syntax

js:forIn.description: Iterating over property values of iterable objects

js:forOf.description: Iterating over property names of iterable objects

js:import.description: Imports entire module statement in ES6 syntax

js:importAs.description: Imports a specific portion of the module by assigning a local alias in ES6 syntax

js:importDestructing.description: Imports only a portion of the module in ES6 syntax

js:importEverything.description: Imports everything as alias from the module in ES6 syntax

js:importNoModuleName.description: Imports entire module in ES6 syntax without module name

js:method.description: Creates a method inside a class in ES6 syntax

js:moduleExports.description: Module exports from Common JS, node syntax at ES6

js:namedFunction.description: Creates a named function in ES6 syntax

js:promise.description: Creates and returns a new Promise in the standard ES6 syntax

js:propertyGet.description: Creates a getter property inside a class in ES6 syntax

js:propertyset.description: Creates a setter property inside a class in ES6 syntax

js:setInterval.description: Executes the given function at specified intervals in ES6 syntax

js:setTimeOut.description: Executes the given function after the specified delay in ES6 syntax

js:thenCatch.description: Add the .then and .catch methods to handle promises
